6292 static int
6293dyn_conpty_init(int verbose)
6294{
6295 static HMODULE hKerneldll = NULL((void*)0);
6296 int i;
6297 static struct
6298 {
6299 char *name;
6300 FARPROC *ptr;
6301 } conpty_entry[] =
6302 {
6303 {"CreatePseudoConsole", (FARPROC*)&pCreatePseudoConsole},
6304 {"ResizePseudoConsole", (FARPROC*)&pResizePseudoConsole},
6305 {"ClosePseudoConsole", (FARPROC*)&pClosePseudoConsole},
6306 {"InitializeProcThreadAttributeList",
6307 (FARPROC*)&pInitializeProcThreadAttributeList},
6308 {"UpdateProcThreadAttribute",
6309 (FARPROC*)&pUpdateProcThreadAttribute},
6310 {"DeleteProcThreadAttributeList",
6311 (FARPROC*)&pDeleteProcThreadAttributeList},
6312 {NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0)}
6313 };
6314
6315 if (!has_conpty_working())
6316 {
6317 if (verbose)
6318 emsg(_("E982: ConPTY is not available")dcgettext (((void*)0), (char *)("E982: ConPTY is not available"
), 5));
6319 return FAIL0;
6320 }
6321
6322 // No need to initialize twice.
6323 if (hKerneldll)
6324 return OK1;
6325
6326 hKerneldll = vimLoadLib("kernel32.dll");
6327 for (i = 0; conpty_entry[i].name != NULL((void*)0)
6328 && conpty_entry[i].ptr != NULL((void*)0); ++i)
6329 {
6330 if ((*conpty_entry[i].ptr = (FARPROC)GetProcAddress(hKerneldll,
6331 conpty_entry[i].name)) == NULL((void*)0))
6332 {
6333 if (verbose)
6334 semsg(_(e_loadfunc)dcgettext (((void*)0), (char *)(e_loadfunc), 5), conpty_entry[i].name);
6335 hKerneldll = NULL((void*)0);
6336 return FAIL0;
6337 }
6338 }
6339
6340 return OK1;
6341}
6342
6343 static int
6344conpty_term_and_job_init(
6345 term_T *term,
6346 typval_T *argvar,
6347 char **argv UNUSED__attribute__((unused)),
6348 jobopt_T *opt,
6349 jobopt_T *orig_opt)
6350{
6351 WCHAR *cmd_wchar = NULL((void*)0);
6352 WCHAR *cmd_wchar_copy = NULL((void*)0);
6353 WCHAR *cwd_wchar = NULL((void*)0);
6354 WCHAR *env_wchar = NULL((void*)0);
6355 channel_T *channel = NULL((void*)0);
6356 job_T *job = NULL((void*)0);
6357 HANDLE jo = NULL((void*)0);
6358 garray_T ga_cmd, ga_env;
6359 char_u *cmd = NULL((void*)0);
6360 HRESULT hr;
6361 COORD consize;
6362 SIZE_T breq;
6363 PROCESS_INFORMATION proc_info;
6364 HANDLE i_theirs = NULL((void*)0);
6365 HANDLE o_theirs = NULL((void*)0);
6366 HANDLE i_ours = NULL((void*)0);
6367 HANDLE o_ours = NULL((void*)0);
6368
6369 ga_init2(&ga_cmd, (int)sizeof(char*), 20);
6370 ga_init2(&ga_env, (int)sizeof(char*), 20);
6371
6372 if (argvar->v_type == VAR_STRING)
6373 {
6374 cmd = argvar->vval.v_string;
6375 }
6376 else if (argvar->v_type == VAR_LIST)
6377 {
6378 if (win32_build_cmd(argvar->vval.v_list, &ga_cmd) == FAIL0)
6379 goto failed;
6380 cmd = ga_cmd.ga_data;
6381 }
6382 if (cmd == NULL((void*)0) || *cmd == NUL'\000')
6383 {
6384 emsg(_(e_invarg)dcgettext (((void*)0), (char *)(e_invarg), 5));
6385 goto failed;
6386 }
6387
6388 term->tl_arg0_cmd = vim_strsave(cmd);
6389
6390 cmd_wchar = enc_to_utf16(cmd, NULL((void*)0));
6391
6392 if (cmd_wchar != NULL((void*)0))
6393 {
6394 // Request by CreateProcessW
6395 breq = wcslen(cmd_wchar) + 1 + 1; // Addition of NUL by API
6396 cmd_wchar_copy = ALLOC_MULT(WCHAR, breq)(WCHAR *)alloc(sizeof(WCHAR) * (breq));
6397 wcsncpy(cmd_wchar_copy, cmd_wchar, breq - 1);
6398 }
6399
6400 ga_clear(&ga_cmd);
6401 if (cmd_wchar == NULL((void*)0))
6402 goto failed;
6403 if (opt->jo_cwd != NULL((void*)0))
6404 cwd_wchar = enc_to_utf16(opt->jo_cwd, NULL((void*)0));
6405
6406 win32_build_env(opt->jo_env, &ga_env, TRUE1);
6407 env_wchar = ga_env.ga_data;
6408
6409 if (!CreatePipe(&i_theirs, &i_ours, NULL((void*)0), 0))
6410 goto failed;
6411 if (!CreatePipe(&o_ours, &o_theirs, NULL((void*)0), 0))
6412 goto failed;
6413
6414 consize.X = term->tl_cols;
6415 consize.Y = term->tl_rows;
6416 hr = pCreatePseudoConsole(consize, i_theirs, o_theirs, 0,
6417 &term->tl_conpty);
6418 if (FAILED(hr))
6419 goto failed;
6420
6421 term->tl_siex.StartupInfo.cb = sizeof(term->tl_siex);
6422
6423 // Set up pipe inheritance safely: Vista or later.
6424 pInitializeProcThreadAttributeList(NULL((void*)0), 1, 0, &breq);
6425 term->tl_siex.lpAttributeList = alloc(breq);
6426 if (!term->tl_siex.lpAttributeList)
6427 goto failed;
6428 if (!pInitializeProcThreadAttributeList(term->tl_siex.lpAttributeList, 1,
6429 0, &breq))
6430 goto failed;
6431 if (!pUpdateProcThreadAttribute(
6432 term->tl_siex.lpAttributeList, 0,
6433 PROC_THREAD_ATTRIBUTE_PSEUDOCONSOLE, term->tl_conpty,
6434 sizeof(HPCON), NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0)))
6435 goto failed;
6436
6437 channel = add_channel();
6438 if (channel == NULL((void*)0))
6439 goto failed;
6440
6441 job = job_alloc();
6442 if (job == NULL((void*)0))
6443 goto failed;
6444 if (argvar->v_type == VAR_STRING)
6445 {
6446 int argc;
6447
6448 build_argv_from_string(cmd, &job->jv_argv, &argc);
6449 }
6450 else
6451 {
6452 int argc;
6453
6454 build_argv_from_list(argvar->vval.v_list, &job->jv_argv, &argc);
6455 }
6456
6457 if (opt->jo_set & JO_IN_BUF0x4000000)
6458 job->jv_in_buf = buflist_findnr(opt->jo_io_buf[PART_IN]);
6459
6460 if (!CreateProcessW(NULL((void*)0), cmd_wchar_copy, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0), FALSE0,
6461 EXTENDED_STARTUPINFO_PRESENT | CREATE_UNICODE_ENVIRONMENT
6462 | CREATE_SUSPENDED | CREATE_DEFAULT_ERROR_MODE,
6463 env_wchar, cwd_wchar,
6464 &term->tl_siex.StartupInfo, &proc_info))
6465 goto failed;
6466
6467 CloseHandle(i_theirs);
6468 CloseHandle(o_theirs);
6469
6470 channel_set_pipes(channel,
6471 (sock_T)i_ours,
6472 (sock_T)o_ours,
6473 (sock_T)o_ours);
6474
6475 // Write lines with CR instead of NL.
6476 channel->ch_write_text_mode = TRUE1;
6477
6478 // Use to explicitly delete anonymous pipe handle.
6479 channel->ch_anonymous_pipe = TRUE1;
6480
6481 jo = CreateJobObject(NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
6482 if (jo == NULL((void*)0))
6483 goto failed;
6484
6485 if (!AssignProcessToJobObject(jo, proc_info.hProcess))
6486 {
6487 // Failed, switch the way to terminate process with TerminateProcess.
6488 CloseHandle(jo);
6489 jo = NULL((void*)0);
6490 }
6491
6492 ResumeThread(proc_info.hThread);
6493 CloseHandle(proc_info.hThread);
6494
6495 vim_free(cmd_wchar);
6496 vim_free(cmd_wchar_copy);
6497 vim_free(cwd_wchar);
6498 vim_free(env_wchar);
6499
6500 if (create_vterm(term, term->tl_rows, term->tl_cols) == FAIL0)
6501 goto failed;
6502
6503#if defined(FEAT_GUI) || defined(FEAT_TERMGUICOLORS)
6504 if (opt->jo_set2 & JO2_ANSI_COLORS0x8000)
6505 set_vterm_palette(term->tl_vterm, opt->jo_ansi_colors);
6506 else
6507 init_vterm_ansi_colors(term->tl_vterm);
6508#endif
6509
6510 channel_set_job(channel, job, opt);
6511 job_set_options(job, opt);
6512
6513 job->jv_channel = channel;
6514 job->jv_proc_info = proc_info;
6515 job->jv_job_object = jo;
6516 job->jv_status = JOB_STARTED;
6517 job->jv_tty_type = vim_strsave((char_u *)"conpty");
6518 ++job->jv_refcount;
6519 term->tl_job = job;
6520
6521 // Redirecting stdout and stderr doesn't work at the job level. Instead
6522 // open the file here and handle it in. opt->jo_io was changed in
6523 // setup_job_options(), use the original flags here.
6524 if (orig_opt->jo_io[PART_OUT] == JIO_FILE)
6525 {
6526 char_u *fname = opt->jo_io_name[PART_OUT];
6527
6528 ch_log(channel, "Opening output file %s", fname);
6529 term->tl_out_fd = mch_fopen((char *)fname, WRITEBIN)fopen(((char *)fname), ("w"));
6530 if (term->tl_out_fd == NULL((void*)0))
6531 semsg(_(e_notopen)dcgettext (((void*)0), (char *)(e_notopen), 5), fname);
6532 }
6533
6534 return OK1;
6535
6536failed:
6537 ga_clear(&ga_cmd);
6538 ga_clear(&ga_env);
6539 vim_free(cmd_wchar);
6540 vim_free(cmd_wchar_copy);
6541 vim_free(cwd_wchar);
6542 if (channel != NULL((void*)0))
6543 channel_clear(channel);
6544 if (job != NULL((void*)0))
6545 {
6546 job->jv_channel = NULL((void*)0);
6547 job_cleanup(job);
6548 }
6549 term->tl_job = NULL((void*)0);
6550 if (jo != NULL((void*)0))
6551 CloseHandle(jo);
6552
6553 if (term->tl_siex.lpAttributeList != NULL((void*)0))
6554 {
6555 pDeleteProcThreadAttributeList(term->tl_siex.lpAttributeList);
6556 vim_free(term->tl_siex.lpAttributeList);
6557 }
6558 term->tl_siex.lpAttributeList = NULL((void*)0);
6559 if (o_theirs != NULL((void*)0))
6560 CloseHandle(o_theirs);
6561 if (o_ours != NULL((void*)0))
6562 CloseHandle(o_ours);
6563 if (i_ours != NULL((void*)0))
6564 CloseHandle(i_ours);
6565 if (i_theirs != NULL((void*)0))
6566 CloseHandle(i_theirs);
6567 if (term->tl_conpty != NULL((void*)0))
6568 pClosePseudoConsole(term->tl_conpty);
6569 term->tl_conpty = NULL((void*)0);
6570 return FAIL0;
6571}

6592 if (term->tl_conpty != NULL((void*)0))

6594 term->tl_conpty = NULL((void*)0);
6595}

6632dyn_winpty_init(int verbose)
6633{
6634 int i;
6635 static struct
6636 {
6637 char *name;
6638 FARPROC *ptr;
6639 } winpty_entry[] =
6640 {
6641 {"winpty_conerr_name", (FARPROC*)&winpty_conerr_name},

6645 (FARPROC*)&winpty_config_set_mouse_mode},
6646 {"winpty_config_set_initial_size",
6647 (FARPROC*)&winpty_config_set_initial_size},
6648 {"winpty_conin_name", (FARPROC*)&winpty_conin_name},
6649 {"winpty_conout_name", (FARPROC*)&winpty_conout_name},
6650 {"winpty_error_free", (FARPROC*)&winpty_error_free},
6651 {"winpty_free", (FARPROC*)&winpty_free},
6652 {"winpty_open", (FARPROC*)&winpty_open},
6653 {"winpty_spawn", (FARPROC*)&winpty_spawn},

6657 {"winpty_set_size", (FARPROC*)&winpty_set_size},
6658 {"winpty_agent_process", (FARPROC*)&winpty_agent_process},
6659 {NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0)}
6660 };
6661
6662 // No need to initialize twice.
6663 if (hWinPtyDLL)
6664 return OK1;
6665 // Load winpty.dll, prefer using the 'winptydll' option, fall back to just
6666 // winpty.dll.
6667 if (*p_winptydll != NUL'\000')

6669 if (!hWinPtyDLL)

6671 if (!hWinPtyDLL)
6672 {
6673 if (verbose)
6674 semsg(_(e_loadlib)dcgettext (((void*)0), (char *)(e_loadlib), 5), *p_winptydll != NUL'\000' ? p_winptydll
6675 : (char_u *)WINPTY_DLL);
6676 return FAIL0;
6677 }
6678 for (i = 0; winpty_entry[i].name != NULL((void*)0)
6679 && winpty_entry[i].ptr != NULL((void*)0); ++i)
6680 {
6681 if ((*winpty_entry[i].ptr = (FARPROC)GetProcAddress(hWinPtyDLL,
6682 winpty_entry[i].name)) == NULL((void*)0))
6683 {
6684 if (verbose)
6685 semsg(_(e_loadfunc)dcgettext (((void*)0), (char *)(e_loadfunc), 5), winpty_entry[i].name);
6686 hWinPtyDLL = NULL((void*)0);
6687 return FAIL0;
6688 }
6689 }
6690
6691 return OK1;
6692}

6694 static int
6695winpty_term_and_job_init(
6696 term_T *term,
6697 typval_T *argvar,
6698 char **argv UNUSED__attribute__((unused)),
6699 jobopt_T *opt,
6700 jobopt_T *orig_opt)
6701{
6702 WCHAR *cmd_wchar = NULL((void*)0);
6703 WCHAR *cwd_wchar = NULL((void*)0);
6704 WCHAR *env_wchar = NULL((void*)0);
6705 channel_T *channel = NULL((void*)0);
6706 job_T *job = NULL((void*)0);
6707 DWORD error;
6708 HANDLE jo = NULL((void*)0);
6709 HANDLE child_process_handle;
6710 HANDLE child_thread_handle;
6711 void *winpty_err = NULL((void*)0);
6712 void *spawn_config = NULL((void*)0);
6713 garray_T ga_cmd, ga_env;
6714 char_u *cmd = NULL((void*)0);
6715
6716 ga_init2(&ga_cmd, (int)sizeof(char*), 20);
6717 ga_init2(&ga_env, (int)sizeof(char*), 20);
6718
6719 if (argvar->v_type == VAR_STRING)
6720 {
6721 cmd = argvar->vval.v_string;
6722 }
6723 else if (argvar->v_type == VAR_LIST)
6724 {
6725 if (win32_build_cmd(argvar->vval.v_list, &ga_cmd) == FAIL0)
6726 goto failed;
6727 cmd = ga_cmd.ga_data;
6728 }
6729 if (cmd == NULL((void*)0) || *cmd == NUL'\000')
6730 {
6731 emsg(_(e_invarg)dcgettext (((void*)0), (char *)(e_invarg), 5));
6732 goto failed;
6733 }
6734
6735 term->tl_arg0_cmd = vim_strsave(cmd);
6736
6737 cmd_wchar = enc_to_utf16(cmd, NULL((void*)0));
6738 ga_clear(&ga_cmd);
6739 if (cmd_wchar == NULL((void*)0))
6740 goto failed;
6741 if (opt->jo_cwd != NULL((void*)0))
6742 cwd_wchar = enc_to_utf16(opt->jo_cwd, NULL((void*)0));
6743
6744 win32_build_env(opt->jo_env, &ga_env, TRUE1);
6745 env_wchar = ga_env.ga_data;
6746
6747 term->tl_winpty_config = winpty_config_new(0, &winpty_err);
6748 if (term->tl_winpty_config == NULL((void*)0))
6749 goto failed;
6750
6751 winpty_config_set_mouse_mode(term->tl_winpty_config,
6752 WINPTY_MOUSE_MODE_FORCE);
6753 winpty_config_set_initial_size(term->tl_winpty_config,
6754 term->tl_cols, term->tl_rows);
6755 term->tl_winpty = winpty_open(term->tl_winpty_config, &winpty_err);
6756 if (term->tl_winpty == NULL((void*)0))
6757 goto failed;
6758
6759 spawn_config = winpty_spawn_config_new(
6760 WINPTY_SPAWN_FLAG_AUTO_SHUTDOWN |
6761 WINPTY_SPAWN_FLAG_EXIT_AFTER_SHUTDOWN,
6762 NULL((void*)0),
6763 cmd_wchar,
6764 cwd_wchar,
6765 env_wchar,
6766 &winpty_err);
6767 if (spawn_config == NULL((void*)0))
6768 goto failed;
6769
6770 channel = add_channel();
6771 if (channel == NULL((void*)0))
6772 goto failed;
6773
6774 job = job_alloc();
6775 if (job == NULL((void*)0))
6776 goto failed;
6777 if (argvar->v_type == VAR_STRING)
6778 {
6779 int argc;
6780
6781 build_argv_from_string(cmd, &job->jv_argv, &argc);
6782 }
6783 else
6784 {
6785 int argc;
6786
6787 build_argv_from_list(argvar->vval.v_list, &job->jv_argv, &argc);
6788 }
6789
6790 if (opt->jo_set & JO_IN_BUF0x4000000)
6791 job->jv_in_buf = buflist_findnr(opt->jo_io_buf[PART_IN]);
6792
6793 if (!winpty_spawn(term->tl_winpty, spawn_config, &child_process_handle,
6794 &child_thread_handle, &error, &winpty_err))
6795 goto failed;
6796
6797 channel_set_pipes(channel,
6798 (sock_T)CreateFileW(
6799 winpty_conin_name(term->tl_winpty),
6800 GENERIC_WRITE, 0, NULL((void*)0),
6801 OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL((void*)0)),
6802 (sock_T)CreateFileW(
6803 winpty_conout_name(term->tl_winpty),
6804 GENERIC_READ, 0, NULL((void*)0),
6805 OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL((void*)0)),
6806 (sock_T)CreateFileW(
6807 winpty_conerr_name(term->tl_winpty),
6808 GENERIC_READ, 0, NULL((void*)0),
6809 OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL((void*)0)));
6810
6811 // Write lines with CR instead of NL.
6812 channel->ch_write_text_mode = TRUE1;
6813
6814 jo = CreateJobObject(NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
6815 if (jo == NULL((void*)0))
6816 goto failed;
6817
6818 if (!AssignProcessToJobObject(jo, child_process_handle))
6819 {
6820 // Failed, switch the way to terminate process with TerminateProcess.
6821 CloseHandle(jo);
6822 jo = NULL((void*)0);
6823 }
6824
6825 winpty_spawn_config_free(spawn_config);
6826 vim_free(cmd_wchar);
6827 vim_free(cwd_wchar);
6828 vim_free(env_wchar);
6829
6830 if (create_vterm(term, term->tl_rows, term->tl_cols) == FAIL0)
6831 goto failed;
6832
6833#if defined(FEAT_GUI) || defined(FEAT_TERMGUICOLORS)
6834 if (opt->jo_set2 & JO2_ANSI_COLORS0x8000)
6835 set_vterm_palette(term->tl_vterm, opt->jo_ansi_colors);
6836 else
6837 init_vterm_ansi_colors(term->tl_vterm);
6838#endif
6839
6840 channel_set_job(channel, job, opt);
6841 job_set_options(job, opt);
6842
6843 job->jv_channel = channel;
6844 job->jv_proc_info.hProcess = child_process_handle;
6845 job->jv_proc_info.dwProcessId = GetProcessId(child_process_handle);
6846 job->jv_job_object = jo;
6847 job->jv_status = JOB_STARTED;
6848 job->jv_tty_in = utf16_to_enc(
6849 (short_u *)winpty_conin_name(term->tl_winpty), NULL((void*)0));
6850 job->jv_tty_out = utf16_to_enc(
6851 (short_u *)winpty_conout_name(term->tl_winpty), NULL((void*)0));
6852 job->jv_tty_type = vim_strsave((char_u *)"winpty");
6853 ++job->jv_refcount;
6854 term->tl_job = job;
6855
6856 // Redirecting stdout and stderr doesn't work at the job level. Instead
6857 // open the file here and handle it in. opt->jo_io was changed in
6858 // setup_job_options(), use the original flags here.
6859 if (orig_opt->jo_io[PART_OUT] == JIO_FILE)
6860 {
6861 char_u *fname = opt->jo_io_name[PART_OUT];
6862
6863 ch_log(channel, "Opening output file %s", fname);
6864 term->tl_out_fd = mch_fopen((char *)fname, WRITEBIN)fopen(((char *)fname), ("w"));
6865 if (term->tl_out_fd == NULL((void*)0))
6866 semsg(_(e_notopen)dcgettext (((void*)0), (char *)(e_notopen), 5), fname);
6867 }
6868
6869 return OK1;
6870
6871failed:
6872 ga_clear(&ga_cmd);
6873 ga_clear(&ga_env);
6874 vim_free(cmd_wchar);
6875 vim_free(cwd_wchar);
6876 if (spawn_config != NULL((void*)0))
6877 winpty_spawn_config_free(spawn_config);
6878 if (channel != NULL((void*)0))
6879 channel_clear(channel);
6880 if (job != NULL((void*)0))
6881 {
6882 job->jv_channel = NULL((void*)0);
6883 job_cleanup(job);
6884 }
6885 term->tl_job = NULL((void*)0);
6886 if (jo != NULL((void*)0))
6887 CloseHandle(jo);
6888 if (term->tl_winpty != NULL((void*)0))
6889 winpty_free(term->tl_winpty);
6890 term->tl_winpty = NULL((void*)0);
6891 if (term->tl_winpty_config != NULL((void*)0))
6892 winpty_config_free(term->tl_winpty_config);
6893 term->tl_winpty_config = NULL((void*)0);
6894 if (winpty_err != NULL((void*)0))
6895 {
6896 char *msg = (char *)utf16_to_enc(
6897 (short_u *)winpty_error_msg(winpty_err), NULL((void*)0));
6898
6899 emsg(msg);
6900 winpty_error_free(winpty_err);
6901 }
6902 return FAIL0;
6903}
6904
6905/*
6906 * Create a new terminal of "rows" by "cols" cells.
6907 * Store a reference in "term".
6908 * Return OK or FAIL.
6909 */
6910 static int
6911term_and_job_init(
6912 term_T *term,
6913 typval_T *argvar,
6914 char **argv,
6915 jobopt_T *opt,
6916 jobopt_T *orig_opt)
6917{
6918 int use_winpty = FALSE0;
6919 int use_conpty = FALSE0;
6920 int tty_type = *p_twt;
6921
6922 has_winpty = dyn_winpty_init(FALSE0) != FAIL0 ? TRUE1 : FALSE0;
6923 has_conpty = dyn_conpty_init(FALSE0) != FAIL0 ? TRUE1 : FALSE0;
6924
6925 if (!has_winpty && !has_conpty)
6926 // If neither is available give the errors for winpty, since when
6927 // conpty is not available it can't be installed either.
6928 return dyn_winpty_init(TRUE1);
6929
6930 if (opt->jo_tty_type != NUL'\000')
6931 tty_type = opt->jo_tty_type;
6932
6933 if (tty_type == NUL'\000')
6934 {
6935 if (has_conpty && (is_conpty_stable() || !has_winpty))
6936 use_conpty = TRUE1;
6937 else if (has_winpty)
6938 use_winpty = TRUE1;
6939 // else: error
6940 }
6941 else if (tty_type == 'w') // winpty
6942 {
6943 if (has_winpty)
6944 use_winpty = TRUE1;
6945 }
6946 else if (tty_type == 'c') // conpty
6947 {
6948 if (has_conpty)
6949 use_conpty = TRUE1;
6950 else
6951 return dyn_conpty_init(TRUE1);
6952 }
6953
6954 if (use_conpty)
6955 return conpty_term_and_job_init(term, argvar, argv, opt, orig_opt);
6956
6957 if (use_winpty)
6958 return winpty_term_and_job_init(term, argvar, argv, opt, orig_opt);
6959
6960 // error
6961 return dyn_winpty_init(TRUE1);
6962}
6963
6964 static int
6965create_pty_only(term_T *term, jobopt_T *options)
6966{
6967 HANDLE hPipeIn = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
6968 HANDLE hPipeOut = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
6969 char in_name[80], out_name[80];
6970 channel_T *channel = NULL((void*)0);
6971
6972 if (create_vterm(term, term->tl_rows, term->tl_cols) == FAIL0)
6973 return FAIL0;
6974
6975 vim_snprintf(in_name, sizeof(in_name), "\\\\.\\pipe\\vim-%d-in-%d",
6976 GetCurrentProcessId(),
6977 curbuf->b_fnum);
6978 hPipeIn = CreateNamedPipe(in_name, PIPE_ACCESS_OUTBOUND,
6979 PIPE_TYPE_MESSAGE | PIPE_NOWAIT,
6980 PIPE_UNLIMITED_INSTANCES,
6981 0, 0, NMPWAIT_NOWAIT, NULL((void*)0));
6982 if (hPipeIn == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
6983 goto failed;
6984
6985 vim_snprintf(out_name, sizeof(out_name), "\\\\.\\pipe\\vim-%d-out-%d",
6986 GetCurrentProcessId(),
6987 curbuf->b_fnum);
6988 hPipeOut = CreateNamedPipe(out_name, PIPE_ACCESS_INBOUND,
6989 PIPE_TYPE_MESSAGE | PIPE_NOWAIT,
6990 PIPE_UNLIMITED_INSTANCES,
6991 0, 0, 0, NULL((void*)0));
6992 if (hPipeOut == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
6993 goto failed;
6994
6995 ConnectNamedPipe(hPipeIn, NULL((void*)0));
6996 ConnectNamedPipe(hPipeOut, NULL((void*)0));
6997
6998 term->tl_job = job_alloc();
6999 if (term->tl_job == NULL((void*)0))
7000 goto failed;
7001 ++term->tl_job->jv_refcount;
7002
7003 // behave like the job is already finished
7004 term->tl_job->jv_status = JOB_FINISHED;
7005
7006 channel = add_channel();
7007 if (channel == NULL((void*)0))
7008 goto failed;
7009 term->tl_job->jv_channel = channel;
7010 channel->ch_keep_open = TRUE1;
7011 channel->ch_named_pipe = TRUE1;
7012
7013 channel_set_pipes(channel,
7014 (sock_T)hPipeIn,
7015 (sock_T)hPipeOut,
7016 (sock_T)hPipeOut);
7017 channel_set_job(channel, term->tl_job, options);
7018 term->tl_job->jv_tty_in = vim_strsave((char_u*)in_name);
7019 term->tl_job->jv_tty_out = vim_strsave((char_u*)out_name);
7020
7021 return OK1;
7022
7023failed:
7024 if (hPipeIn != NULL((void*)0))
7025 CloseHandle(hPipeIn);
7026 if (hPipeOut != NULL((void*)0))
7027 CloseHandle(hPipeOut);
7028 return FAIL0;
7029}

7031/*
7032 * Free the terminal emulator part of "term".
7033 */
7034 static void
7035term_free_vterm(term_T *term)
7036{
7037 term_free_conpty(term);
7038 if (term->tl_winpty != NULL((void*)0))
7039 winpty_free(term->tl_winpty);
7040 term->tl_winpty = NULL((void*)0);
7041 if (term->tl_winpty_config != NULL((void*)0))
7042 winpty_config_free(term->tl_winpty_config);
7043 term->tl_winpty_config = NULL((void*)0);
7044 if (term->tl_vterm != NULL((void*)0))
7045 vterm_free(term->tl_vterm);
7046 term->tl_vterm = NULL((void*)0);
7047}

7049/*
7050 * Report the size to the terminal.
7051 */
7052 static void
7053term_report_winsize(term_T *term, int rows, int cols)
7054{
7055 if (term->tl_conpty)
7056 conpty_term_report_winsize(term, rows, cols);
7057 if (term->tl_winpty)
7058 winpty_set_size(term->tl_winpty, cols, rows, NULL((void*)0));
7059}

7061 int
7062terminal_enabled(void)
7063{
7064 return dyn_winpty_init(FALSE0) == OK1 || dyn_conpty_init(FALSE0) == OK1;
7065}
7066
7067# else
7068
7069///////////////////////////////////////
7070// 3. Unix-like implementation.
7071
7072/*
7073 * Create a new terminal of "rows" by "cols" cells.
7074 * Start job for "cmd".
7075 * Store the pointers in "term".
7076 * When "argv" is not NULL then "argvar" is not used.
7077 * Return OK or FAIL.
7078 */
7079 static int
7080term_and_job_init(
7081 term_T *term,
7082 typval_T *argvar,
7083 char **argv,
7084 jobopt_T *opt,
7085 jobopt_T *orig_opt UNUSED__attribute__((unused)))
7086{
7087 term->tl_arg0_cmd = NULL((void*)0);
7088
7089 if (create_vterm(term, term->tl_rows, term->tl_cols) == FAIL0)
7090 return FAIL0;
7091
7092#if defined(FEAT_GUI) || defined(FEAT_TERMGUICOLORS)
7093 if (opt->jo_set2 & JO2_ANSI_COLORS0x8000)
7094 set_vterm_palette(term->tl_vterm, opt->jo_ansi_colors);
7095 else
7096 init_vterm_ansi_colors(term->tl_vterm);
7097#endif
7098
7099 // This may change a string in "argvar".
7100 term->tl_job = job_start(argvar, argv, opt, &term->tl_job);
7101 if (term->tl_job != NULL((void*)0))
7102 ++term->tl_job->jv_refcount;
7103
7104 return term->tl_job != NULL((void*)0)
7105 && term->tl_job->jv_channel != NULL((void*)0)
7106 && term->tl_job->jv_status != JOB_FAILED ? OK1 : FAIL0;
7107}
7108
7109 static int
7110create_pty_only(term_T *term, jobopt_T *opt)
7111{
7112 if (create_vterm(term, term->tl_rows, term->tl_cols) == FAIL0)
7113 return FAIL0;
7114
7115 term->tl_job = job_alloc();
7116 if (term->tl_job == NULL((void*)0))
7117 return FAIL0;
7118 ++term->tl_job->jv_refcount;
7119
7120 // behave like the job is already finished
7121 term->tl_job->jv_status = JOB_FINISHED;
7122
7123 return mch_create_pty_channel(term->tl_job, opt);
7124}

7126/*
7127 * Free the terminal emulator part of "term".
7128 */
7129 static void
7130term_free_vterm(term_T *term)
7131{
7132 if (term->tl_vterm != NULL((void*)0))
7133 vterm_free(term->tl_vterm);
7134 term->tl_vterm = NULL((void*)0);
7135}
7136
7137/*
7138 * Report the size to the terminal.
7139 */
7140 static void
7141term_report_winsize(term_T *term, int rows, int cols)
7142{
7143 // Use an ioctl() to report the new window size to the job.
7144 if (term->tl_job != NULL((void*)0) && term->tl_job->jv_channel != NULL((void*)0))
7145 {
7146 int fd = -1;
7147 int part;
7148
7149 for (part = PART_OUT; part < PART_COUNT; ++part)
7150 {
7151 fd = term->tl_job->jv_channel->ch_part[part].ch_fd;
7152 if (mch_isatty(fd))
7153 break;
7154 }
7155 if (part < PART_COUNT && mch_report_winsize(fd, rows, cols) == OK1)
7156 mch_signal_job(term->tl_job, (char_u *)"winch");
7157 }
7158}
